edu.gcu.cst341.interfaces

Interface iTrans

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account, Checking, Loan, Saving

    public interface iTrans
    Interface of method declarations for logging banking transactions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTransaction(double amount, java.lang.String transType)
      Method to add a transaction to the transaction list
      void doEndOfMonth()
      Method to do the end of month close for an account
      boolean isFeeRequired()
      Method to determine if a fee is required for the account based on account type

    • Method Detail

      • addTransaction

        void addTransaction(double amount,
                    java.lang.String transType)
        Method to add a transaction to the transaction list
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of the transaction
        transType - the type (description) of the transaction

      • doEndOfMonth

        void doEndOfMonth()
        Method to do the end of month close for an account

      • isFeeRequired

        boolean isFeeRequired()
        Method to determine if a fee is required for the account based on account type
        Returns:
        true if a fee is required or false otherwise
